issue.title: [CF 1263] Text Layout - Unintended Renaming Bug
issue.body:
When you click inside the rename editbox for a Text Layout and then click on a different Text Layout it copies the name to that layout, (before successfully selecting it).

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. /reloadui, /tmw, right click an icon.
    Either click the Layout Settings gear icon beside the icon's current text layout or enter via. General tab > Text Layouts.
2. Select a non-default text layout if one isn't already and click anywhere inside the renaming editbox.
3. Click a different text layout in the list on the left and it will rename that layout. I haven't tried doing it to a default text layout out of fear and/or laziness. :^(

Using TellMeWhen version 8.1.1 (also tried it with 8.1.1-11-gda0f7f2)
